html:
Medical Record

Patient Name: {{ doc.patient_name }}

Diseases: {{ doc.diseases }}

Date: {{ doc.date }}

Doctor: {{ doc.doctor }}

{% if "fever" in doc.diseases.lower() %}

Note: Monitor temperature regularly.

{% endif %}
